languages.text: {n}Слегка улыбнувшись, он шепчет:{/n} "За всю жизнь я вряд ли говорил что-либо столь же безумное, но... Я, кажется, в тебя по уши влюблен".
languages.translation_comment:
РТ и соломон танцуют, катсцена
врубаем нашу романтическую тему в органной обработке из OfficialPropos
танец запускать по стопу

languages.text: {n}With a slight smile, he whispers,{/n} "I've never come close to saying anything as crazy as this in all my life, but... I think I'm head over heels in love with you."
languages.original_text: {n}Слегка улыбнувшись, он шепчет:{/n} "За всю жизнь я вряд ли говорил что-либо столь же безумное, но... Я, кажется, в тебя по уши влюблен".

{n}With a slight smile, he whispers,{/n} "I've never come close to saying anything as crazy as this in all my life, but... I think I'm head over heels in love with you."

languages.text: {n}彼はかすかに微笑みながら、そっとささやいた。{/n}「こんな無茶なことを口にするなんて、人生で一度もなかったのですが…どうやらあなたに心の底から恋してしまったようです」
languages.original_text: {n}With a slight smile, he whispers,{/n} "I've never come close to saying anything as crazy as this in all my life, but... I think I'm head over heels in love with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はかすかに微笑みながら、そっとささやいた。{/n}「こんな無茶なことを口にするなんて、人生で一度もなかったのですが…どうやらあなたに心の底から恋してしまったようです」

languages.text: {n}Mit einem leichten Lächeln flüstert er:{/n} "Ich habe noch nie in meinem Leben etwas annähernd so Verrücktes gesagt, aber ... ich denke, ich bin Hals über Kopf in Euch verliebt."
languages.original_text: {n}With a slight smile, he whispers,{/n} "I've never come close to saying anything as crazy as this in all my life, but... I think I'm head over heels in love with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem leichten Lächeln flüstert er:{/n} "Ich habe noch nie in meinem Leben etwas annähernd so Verrücktes gesagt, aber ... ich denke, ich bin Hals über Kopf in Euch verliebt."

languages.text: {n}Un demi-sourire aux lèvres, il murmure :{/n} « De toute ma vie, jamais encore je n'ai seulement envisagé de dire quelque chose d'aussi fou, mais... je crois bien que je suis éperdument amoureux de vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a slight smile, he whispers,{/n} "I've never come close to saying anything as crazy as this in all my life, but... I think I'm head over heels in love with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un demi-sourire aux lèvres, il murmure :{/n} « De toute ma vie, jamais encore je n'ai seulement envisagé de dire quelque chose d'aussi fou, mais... je crois bien que je suis éperdument amoureux de vous. »

languages.text: {n}Esboza una leve sonrisa y murmura:{/n} «Nunca en mi vida me había planteado siquiera insinuar una locura semejante, pero... me parece que estoy coladísimo por usted».
languages.original_text: {n}With a slight smile, he whispers,{/n} "I've never come close to saying anything as crazy as this in all my life, but... I think I'm head over heels in love with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Esboza una leve sonrisa y murmura:{/n} «Nunca en mi vida me había planteado siquiera insinuar una locura semejante, pero... me parece que estoy coladísimo por usted».

languages.text: {n}他微微一笑，对你耳语道。{/n}“我这辈子从来没说过这么疯狂的话，甚至连想都没想过，但……我想，我是彻底爱上你了。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a slight smile, he whispers,{/n} "I've never come close to saying anything as crazy as this in all my life, but... I think I'm head over heels in love with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}他微微一笑，对你耳语道。{/n}“我这辈子从来没说过这么疯狂的话，甚至连想都没想过，但……我想，我是彻底爱上你了。”

languages.text: {n}Hafifçe gülümseyerek fısıldıyor.{/n} "Hayatım boyunca bu denli delice sözleri sarf edeceğimi düşünmezdim ama sana sırılsıklam âşık oldum."
languages.original_text: {n}With a slight smile, he whispers,{/n} "I've never come close to saying anything as crazy as this in all my life, but... I think I'm head over heels in love with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hafifçe gülümseyerek fısıldar.{/n} "Hayatım boyunca bu denli delice sözleri sarf edeceğimi düşünmezdim ama size sırılsıklam âşık oldum."
